physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 8 x 10 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''#358, Olympic Athletic Club, Leadville, Colo 1913, Banquet, Maurice Miller 4th from rt, standing.''

mods.abstract: Members of the Leadville Olympic Athletic Club pose during a banquet. Half of the group is seated and the other half stands behind them. An American flag and OAC pendent hang in the background. Maurice Miller stands fourth from the right.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
